divs: Sighting Detailsthree ships altogether, and one small red orb going around the large one. this happend at 1015 in upstate new york. ship followed 2 people in car then followed the car home after dropping off the person that lived 1 mile away .then the ship broke into a smaller one that came over the house with no sound. the larger ship landed about a mile away, the other person at the other house saw the object very clear. her statment was.. this ship has spokes on it and it is very large and has a red orb going around it.. the ships joined togeather and faded away
